name: Son Rivers
bio:
RIVERS In Memory of infant son of
Dr. J.H. & Lottie Rivers
died Jan. 24, 1901 (no age)
also infant daughter of
George and Ida Bloomfield
died Oct. 3, 1901 (no age)
